korean: 오후 3시쯤 되니까 너무 졸려서 동료한테 커피 한잔 하자고 했다.
점심 먹고 나니까 졸음이 쏟아져서 도저히 못 버티겠더라.
사내 카페에서 아메리카노 마시면서 잠깐 수다 떨었다.
동료도 오후만 되면 항상 졸립다면서 공감하더라.
요즘 진행 중인 프로젝트 얘기도 하고 주말 계획도 공유했다.
그 동료는 주말에 등산 간다고 하고 나는 집에서 쉴 거라고 했어.
카페에서 다른 팀 사람들도 보이던데 다들 쉬러 오나 봐.
15분 쉬었더니 다시 집중할 수 있을 것 같다.
이런 짧은 휴식이 업무 효율에 진짜 도움 되는 것 같아.
english: Around 3 PM I was super drowsy, so I asked a coworker if they wanted to grab coffee.
After lunch, I was so sleepy I honestly couldn't take it anymore.
We chatted for a bit at the office cafe over some americanos.
My coworker said they're always sleepy in the afternoon too, so they totally got it.
We talked about our current projects and shared our weekend plans.
They're going hiking this weekend and I said I'm just gonna chill at home.
I saw people from other teams at the cafe too. I guess everyone comes here to take a break.
The coffee helped me wake up a bit.
After that 15-minute break, I feel like I can focus again.
I went back to my desk and started my afternoon work.
I think these short breaks really help with work efficiency.
I should take a coffee break tomorrow afternoon too.
